sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './newGoal.css' import repeat from '../../assets/goals/repeat.png' import star from '../../assets/goals/Star.png' import { useState } from 'react' function NewGoal({setNewGoal,addGoal,setCurrCategory}) { const [goalInput,setGoalInput] = useState("") const [starInput,setStarInput] = useState("") const [repeatInput,setRepeatInput] = useState(false) const handleGoalInputChange = (e) => { setGoalInput(e.target.value) } const handleStarInputChange = (e) => { setStarInput(e.target.value) } const handleCancel = () => { setClickedCategoryName("") setClickedCategoryId("") setNewGoal(false) } const handleConfirm = () => { const newGoal = {} newGoal.content = goalInput newGoal.stars = starInput newGoal.repeat = repeatInput addGoal(newGoal) setNewGoal(false) console.log(`Goal: ${goalInput}, Star:${starInput}`) } return (
handleGoalInputChange(e)} placeholder="New Goal">
Category: {clickedCategoryName}
handleStarInputChange(e)}>
Description
) } export default NewGoal
